headline.main: Louisiana Woman Arrested in Critical Burning of Niece
headline.print_headline: Louisiana Woman Arrested in Critical Burning of Niece

lead_paragraph: A 29-year-old woman is in custody a month after her 4-year-old niece was critically burned while in her care.
snippet: A 29-year-old woman is in custody a month after her 4-year-old niece was critically burned while in her care....
